reply_content: I agree! This tutorial is perfect for beginners.
Yes, very well structured and easy to follow.
React patterns can be tricky, but this explains them well.
Hooks are definitely a game changer in React!
Node.js is powerful for backend development.
I'd also like to see more middleware examples.
MongoDB design is crucial for performance.
ES6+ makes JavaScript so much more powerful!
Docker has simplified deployment so much.
RESTful APIs are the foundation of modern web apps.
TypeScript adds so much value to JavaScript projects.
